title: How Does It Feel When Your Family Changes?
description: Families grow and change. What does that feel like? We asked kids to tell us about their families, and we speak with author Amy Bloom about how love is not something that needs to be divided up, like a pie, but can expand and multiply.
itunes:subtitle: Families grow and change. What does that feel like? We asked kids to tell us about their families, and we speak with author Amy Bloom about how love is not something that needs to be divided up.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
